Tira Nicaeam, l find, claim a right by an edict of Augustus to the estate of every citizen who dies intestate. You will therefore summon the several parties interested in this question, and with the assistance of Epimachus and Virdius Gemellinus, my Procurators (having duly weighed every argument that shall be alleged against the claim), determine as shall appear most reasonable.
